childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
Hello! I'm Michael McCoy, a web developer in Hampton Roads, Virginia. 
I have been learning the MERN stack using the freeCodeCamp curriculum. 
This website is going to serve as a coding portfolio and homebase to document my coding journey!

Please send any emails to mccoymichaeljohn@gmail.com and I'll get back to you ASAP! You can also find me at [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mccoymichaelj/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mjmcoder), and [GitHub](https://github.com/mccoymichaeljohn).
